analysis: The project appears to be a web application focused on black holes, with a need for a cosmic, dark theme. The existing files suggest a structure for a website with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript components. The CSS file needs to be completed with a dark, cosmic theme, including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. The HTML file should include a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon, and the JavaScript file needs to be updated with proper event handling and functionality for the mobile menu and other interactive elements.

improvements.description: Complete the CSS file with a dark, cosmic theme, including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements.
Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices.
